item.title: We Have AI at Home
item.description: AI has hit the world hard in the last few years. Particularly with the introduction of newer generative AI systems like LLM’s (Large language models like ChatGPT, Bard, Llama), and image generators (like Midjourney, DALL-E-2, Imagen etc.

item.title: How to give a stranger your credit card
item.description: When you go online and buy something it’s taken for granted that the store you’re buying from is protecting your data.

item.title: Intro to Visual Basic for Applications (VBA)
item.description: VBA is a programming language that was created by Microsoft to help program inside their office applications. These office applications have helped students, teachers, office workers, and many others complete tasks quickly.
